author: Justin Baer
title: Two Years After Meltdown, Third Avenue Fund Drops Again
text:
Third Avenue Management LLCâ€™s Focused Credit Fund imploded in late 2015 when credit markets turned rocky. On Wednesday, Third Avenue told investors it marked down the value of its remaining positions by more than 50%.
The timing coincided with a major selloff on Wall Street as major indexes around the world were on track for one of their worst weeks in years. But a person familiar with the matter said the lower mark had nothing to do with the recent market swings. Investors often move to lower the value of their holdings as...
